# tf.contrib.keras.datasets.imdb.get_word_index

### `tf.contrib.keras.datasets.imdb.get_word_index`

``` python
get_word_index(path='imdb_word_index.json')
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/keras/python/keras/datasets/imdb.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow/contrib/keras/python/keras/datasets/imdb.py).

Retrieves the dictionary mapping word indices back to words.

#### Arguments:

    path: where to cache the data (relative to `~/.keras/dataset`).


#### Returns:

    The word index dictionary.
